lead_paragraph: Fox Sports is expected to announce Monday that Joe Buck, its lead N.F.L. play-by-play announcer, would also be the host of its Sunday N.F.L. pregame program. He would replace James Brown, who left earlier this year to rejoin CBS Sports.
snippet: Fox Sports is expected to announce Monday that Joe Buck, its lead N.F.L. play-by-play announcer, would also be the host of its Sunday N.F.L. pregame program. He would replace James Brown, who left earlier this year to rejoin CBS Sports.
